body.name: COSORI Air Fryer TurboBlaze 6.0-Quart Compact Airfryer that Roast, Bake, Proof, 9 Functions, 5 Speeds, Cooks Quickly, 95% Less Oil for Healthier Meals, Varied Recipes, Easy to Clean, Dark Gray
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 11 mins
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 11 mins
features: 9-in-1 Versatility: With a 9-in-1 functionality, it includes Air Fry, Roast, Bake, Broil, Dehydrate, Frozen, Proof, Reheat, and Keep Warm, providing versatile options for all your culinary needs.
Perfectly even cooking: The 5-speed airflow system ensures that your food is evenly cooked throughout, providing superior results for every meal.
Lightning-fast cooking: This Turbo Blaze Air Fryer with standard DC motors cooks up to 46% faster than the old COSORI series*, saving you precious time in the kitchen.

Instructions and Recipes: Step-by-step visual instructions make it easy to cook like a pro, even if you're a beginner, access our comprehensive online recipe library and video tutorials for expert cooking guidance.
6-Quart Capacity: Cook foods of all shapes and sizes for a crowd with the spacious 6-quart nonstick basket.
95% Less Oil: Enjoy the same crispy textures as traditional deep frying with up to 95% less oil. Enjoy all your favorite fried foods without guilty.
Reduced operational noise: Incorporating a snail shell reflector, the Turbo Blaze Air Fryer minimizes noise levels. Enjoying quieter cooking experience.
Compact Design: Save counter space for food prep and easily store the air fryer in an overhead space without compromising on performance.
Dishwasher-Safe: The non-stick cooking basket and detachable components make cleaning a breeze. Spend less time scrubbing and more time enjoying your delicious meals.
Specifications: This Air Fryer is ETL-Listed with a power rating of 120V / 1725W, and a temperature range of 170F°–450°F. Please note that this voltage only applies to the US and Canada.
body.description: COSORI TurboBlaze 6.0-Quart Air FryerUpgrade your cooking game with our revolutional Air Fryer, and enjoy faster cooking times, versatile functionality, and exceptional results. With its compact size and large capacity, this is the ultimate kitchen companion for the health concious family. Try it now and transform the way you cook!Specifications:Model: CAF-DC601-KUSPower Supply: DC 120V, 60HzRated Power: 1,725WCapacity: 6 qt /5.7 L (serves 3-5 people)Temperature Range: 90°-450°F/ 30°-230°CTime Range: 1 min-24 hrDimensions: 11.8 x 14.4 x 11.9 in (including handle)Weight: 13.2 lb /6 kgFeatured Accessories:COSORI Air Fryer Silicone Liners for 5-7 Qt #B0CF533WPB COSORI Foldable Air Fryer Silicone Liners for 5-7 Qt #B0CF5BYX3WCOSORI Air Fryer Paper Liners for 5-7 Qt #B0BSFNTD3NCOSORI Air Fryer Accessories, Set of 6 for 5-7 Qt #B07QHSZGXCTest Run:In order to make sure the air fryer is working correctly and remove potential odors from the manufacturing process, please follow the instructions in the manual for the Test Run before cooking with your air fryer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Easy to Clean The nonstick basket and crisper plate are both dishwasher-safe. Safety First The air fryer automatically pauses cooking when the basket is removed and turns off if the unit overheats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does an excellent job!
reviews.reviewText: This is a gem of an air fryer. Six quart is a nice size for just about anything. So far I've done french fries, pork chops, chicken drumsticks , sausage subs with mushrooms, onions and peppers and I've heated frozen burritos , frozen hash brown patties and frozen hot pockets. All were excellent. And this fryer does them fast! The controls are easy to use. And when your done, this is about the simplest kitchen appliance to clean. I did a lot of research before selecting this Cosori air fryer, and so far I haven't run into any of the issues I read about with other brands. This is a well made, great performing air fryer. Note that it comes with an extensive recipe book, very clear instructions and a 2 year warranty,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best air fryer
reviews.reviewText: WOW. !! I’ve never owned an air fryer before, but I read all the reviews of the other air fryers that were listed on Amazon. The other air fryers did not meet my expectations. The Cosori Air fryer seem to be the best air fryer of the bunch. It’s super easy to operate and I have a problem with technology. I’ve already cooked two meals with my air fryer and they came out perfect potstickers and dumplings. Be sure you wash the basket first in hot water and soap. there’s no plastic smell. There’s no burnt plastic smell at all. The food came out perfect better than frying in a pan baking in the oven or using a steamer. I’m loving my Cosori. Air fryer a lot. Very quick easy to clean really easy to clean. I wish I had bought an air fryer sooner. This is definitely the best air fryer on the market. A little pricey, but you won’t be sorry you bought it it’s very well-made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING QUALITY AND NO AFTERTASTE!!!
reviews.reviewText: Now I’ve never really been a fan of air fryers, but this one is so good!!!! And it’s big enough to feed a family of 4, possibly even 5. The air fryers I’ve had left this taste of like electric in the food, and this one doesn’t AT ALL!!! I made an entire bag of French fries and they came out soooo delicious and the perfect crunch. Also made chicken patties and they came out delicious better than the old fashioned deep fry!!! I highly recommend, worth every penny. It’s easy to use, it comes with a little cook book for air fryer meals and ideas!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Done tons of research, so happy with my choice.
reviews.reviewText: The COSORI Air Fryer TurboBlaze 6.0-Quart has become a game-changer in my kitchen. Its 6.0-quart capacity is perfect for cooking family-sized meals, and the TurboBlaze technology ensures quick and even cooking. I love how it transforms dishes into crispy delights with minimal oil, promoting healthier eating without sacrificing flavor. The intuitive controls and pre-set functions make it user-friendly, and the sleek design adds a modern touch to my kitchen. Cleaning is a breeze, thanks to the non-stick basket. If you're considering an air fryer, the COSORI TurboBlaze is a fantastic choice for efficiency and delicious results! My 8 YO says I’m obsession because I put everything in it and she’s not wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I did quite a bit of research on air fryers before buying my first one here... and I'm very glad I purchased this one!!It works great and seems easy to use... Easy to clean.Very quiet... Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Valuable appliance for most kitchens
reviews.reviewText: I didn't think I needed another kitchen appliance, as I am conservative about buying more "stuff." After much research I decided on the Cosori turboBlaze, and highly recommend this appliance. Reheating pizza, poppers and anything else that you don't want soggy is wonderful and fast. Great for baking potatoes and other sides when my oven is occupied. My first project was donuts. They are wonderful! The size of the appliance is perfect and it is easy to clean and store.I took 1 star off because the TurboBlaze is faster than other air fryers so you have to adjust recipes. I wish there were more recipes specific for this fryer. I am making my own recipe folder for this air fryer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It took me weeks to decide which brand to buy. I was going to order the 5 quart cosori when I noticed they had a new 6 quart turbo model, so I ordered that. I first tried chicken thighs, bone in and I was amazed at the outcome. Very, very moist and juicy. Tast fantastic. Then made a steak..ok, bit overdone and somewhat dry. They should have included a much better cookbook. My sister bought one that made bread, which was amazing and it came with THREE COMPREHENSIVE COOKBOOKS. But getting back to mine, I really like it a lot. It only supplies heat from the top but the turbo provides good heat although I think there should be in indicator to notify you when to shake. It’s a wonderful machine however there is a learning curve. But go on you tube and look up air fryer recipes and there is all kinds of information. Good kuck and have fun. But this model though. It’s really a good size and seems well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Reviewing from day 1 out of the box. Sleek, easy to use. Loved the chart in the book to help figure out what to cook and for how long and the different settings.Love that the crisping tray fits so snuggly, but comes out easily to clean.I read all kinds of reviews on different air fryers and this one was the best out there!First night we did tater tots and fish sticks! Love the preheat button! Used preheat, then put the tots in for 2 mins, the fish sticks for 8 on Frozen selection! Boom! Perfection!I had an air fryer before, so familiar with how they work. This was a breeze!I reserve the right to comment back later, if something changes. But a solid 5 stars out the gate!
Best buy yeteasy and cooks just fine

Me parece una buena máquina porque es bastante cómoda de usar y más rápida que las que he visto en el mercado, cuando usamos las velocidades turbo. Cuando recibo una receta que no está adaptada entonces uso el programa bake que viene a equivaler lo mismo que en otras freidoras de aire. Además tiene un diseño bonito. Con la aplicación Vesync tenemos recetas e indicaciones de programa, tiempo y temperatura adaptados a este modelo.

Schickes Design,kleine Abmessungen,angenehmes Geräusch,leichte Reinigung.Besonders gefällt mir auch das tolle Display und daß ich als Langzeitvegetarierin nicht ständig Symbole für Fleisch und Fisch sehen muß, mit denen ich nichts anfangen könnte.Die kleinen Abmessungen werden auch dadurch erreicht, daß man nur eine durchbrochene Platte in die Schublade einsetzt und nicht einen Korbeinsatz hat, wo dann seitlich noch mal Abstände zur Schublade wären.Die Variante mit Korbeinsatz hat prinzipiell natürlich den Vorteil, daß die heiße Luft auch um den Korb herumfließen und das Gargut somit auch von unten erreichen kann. Inwieweit sich dieses fehlende Feature negativ bemerkbar macht, kann ich noch nicht sagen, werde aber auf jeden Fall nachberichten. Vielleicht wird es ja durch den Turbo Blaze mit stärkerem Luftstrom ausgeglichen.Die ersten Frühlingsrollen als Testlauf, wo ja allerdings Luft dazwischen ist, sind jedenfalls super geworden, und zwar von oben und unten, ich hätte sie gar nicht wenden müssen.Eine Erinnerungsfunktion zum Wenden bzw. Aufschütteln nach der Hälfte der Zeit hat dieses Gerät übrigens nicht. Ich stelle daher immer die Hälfte der Zeit ein und das dann nochmals.Ein Nachteil dieses Systems Platte in Schublade gegenüber Korbeinsatz in Schublade ist, daß bei Letzterem durch die seitlichen Abstände zwischen Korbeinsatz und Schublade der Garraum größer ist. Dadurch konnte man als Einzelperson beim Philips Airfryer, den ich früher mal hatte, mit dem entsprechenden Zusatztkit auch eine TK-Pizza garen, die in die kleinere Schublade der Kosori nicht hineinpaßt. Da wir 2 Personen sind, mache ich allerdings auch immer 2 Pizzen, und die dann natürlich im Backofen.Im Vergleich zu dem früheren Philips Airfryer (dämlicherweise verkauft, daher die Neuanschaffung) ist diese Kosori wesentlich leicher zu reinigen (mit der Hand):1. ist die Schublade kleiner und handlicher,2. entfällt der zusätzliche seesternartige Einsatz, den die Philips unten zusätzlich hatte,3. ist die durchlöcherte antihaftbeschichtete Platte viel leichter abzuwaschen als das feine Gitter, das der Philips-Garkorb unten hat, und4. ist die einfache Platte auch von der Form her viel leicher abzuwaschen als ein ganzer Korbeinsatz.Die Platte wird übrigens durch Gumminupse in Position gehalten, die hinter einer kleinen Erhebung einrasten. Bis jetzt sitzt sie fest und fällt nicht heraus.Ich bin bisher total glücklich mit der Maschine und werde noch nachberichten, ob die fehlende Luft von unten sich negativ bemerkbar macht.Zum Abstellen der Schublade habe ich übrigens diesen Topfuntersetzer gekauft, der ist super:https://www.amazon.de/gp/aw/d/B0C786F3NB?psc=1&ref=ppx_pop_mob_b_asin_imageDie vordere Kunststoffkante der Schublade wird nicht heiß und steht auf dem Tisch, der Rest auf dem Untersetzer, den ich später wieder in der Schublade verstauen kann.

Le Air Frayer COSORI Turbo Blaze est un appareil exceptionnel qui a surpassé toutes mes attentes. Sa technologie de cuisson turbo offre une rapidité impressionnante, assurant des plats parfaitement croustillants en un temps record. La capacité généreuse du panier (6L) permet de préparer des portions généreuses, idéales pour les repas en famille. De plus, son interface conviviale et ses nombreuses options de réglage en font un outil polyvalent, adapté à une variété de recettes. La qualité de construction est également remarquable, ajoutant une durabilité appréciable à ses performances exceptionnelles. En résumé, le COSORI Turbo Blaze est un investissement culinaire incontournable pour tous les amateurs de cuisine moderne.

Dopo circa un mese di utilizzo della nuovissima Turbo Blaze da 6,4 litri, posso affermare che la friggitrice in questione è praticamente perfetta. Rispetto ai modelli precedenti (ho avuto per un annetto la dual) la nuova COSORI Turbo Blaze ha migliorato notevolmente i tempi di cottura e implementato nuove ed interessanti funzionalità.La nuova friggitrice ad aria Turbo Blaze mi è stata spedita da Amazon ben protetta all’interno di una doppia confezione che protegge efficacemente il contenuto.All’interno della scatola principale, troviamo la friggitrice con il proprio cestello estraibile, la manualistica e un utile ricettario, con ricette internazionali ed italiane, molto utile nei primi giorni e per comprendere al meglio tutte le funzionalità della friggitrice.Letto il manuale, lavato il cestello e il piano di cottura, ho scaricato l’app VeSync di Cosori. Quest’ultima non permette di controllare la friggitrice (non si tratta di un modello WiFi) ma che si dimostra molto utile come guida nell’utilizzo e come fonte di ispirazione per nuovi piatti e preparazioni.Cosori, sul modello Turbo Blaze, ha puntato sulla semplicità del design e su uno stile “minimal” rendendo la friggitrice un elemento di design, bella, elegante e facile da inserire in ogni contesto e tipo di cucina.La costruzione è di ottima qualità e le plastiche nere opache rendono di un piacevole impatto visivo e un gradevole “feeling” al tatto.Nella parte superiore della friggitrice un ampio pannello touch capacitivo, nero lucido, ospita il display di comando: perfettamente leggibile anche in qualsiasi condizione di luce, e una serie di funzioni che permettono di accedere alle numerose funzionalità della nuova Turbo Blaze.Sul display, oltre alle classiche informazioni legate a temperatura, tempo di cottura e velocità di rotazione della ventola interna, le 6 funzioni principali (pre-riscaldamento, riscaldare, disidratare, cuocere al forno, cottura e tenere in temperatura) e le 4 modalità turbo (friggitrice ad aria, arrostire, grill, congelati).Frontalmente, il cassetto da 6 litri con maniglia con pulsante di sblocco.L’unica serpentina, nella parte superiore della friggitrice, sovrasta la ventola “Turbo” che permette il ricircolo dell’aria calda e la cottura uniforme del cibo.Il cassetto ha un’ottima capacità e permette di cucinare porzioni di cibo abbondanti e sufficienti anche per 3 o 4 persone.All’interno del cassetto è posizionabile la griglia removibile, con piedini in silicone che ne permettono la tenuta anche in caso di “ribaltamento” del cestello e né impediscono la rigatura.La friggitrice ad aria COSORI è conforme a tutte le norme relative ai campi elettromagnetici (CEM). Tutti i componenti del cestello sono certificati RoHS, con ottimi materiali anti-aderenti e sono lavabili in lavastoviglie.Le dimensioni sono nella media, parliamo di 34 x 30 x 30 centimetri che ci consentono di posizionarla senza difficoltà su un piano di lavoro e di riporla con facilità all’interno di un mobile o di una credenza.Le modalità di cottura presenti sono:Turbo:1) FRY = frittura ad aria2) ROAST = arrostire3) GRILL = grigliare4) FROZEN = Frozen (Congelato) è ideale per alimenti piccoli o impanati, come nugget, polpette e involtini.Quelle classiche :1) PRE HEAT = pre-riscaldamento. Fondamentale portare la friggitrice alla corretta temperatura di utilizzo.2) REHEAT = riscaldamento del cibo già cucinato e a temperatura ambiente o riposto in frigorifero;3) DRY: disidratazione degli alimenti;4) BAKE = cottura a forno;5) PROOF = Lievitazione degli impasti, con una temperatura impostabile tra i 30° e 45°, per un tempo di minimo 15min e max 12 ore;6) WARM = mantenimento caldo dei cibi già cucinati a una temperatura di 75° con un timer automatico di 60 minuti.In conclusione, il mio giudizio è molto positivo e consiglierei una COSORI ad occhi chiusi. È il marchio che ho apprezzato di più e testato a lungo, non a caso.Se opterete per una COSORI Turbo Blaze non rimarrete delusi: è un prodotto ben costruito, cucina perfettamente, ha molte modalità di cottura e garantisce un’ottima cottura di qualsiasi pietanza.
